statements: UPDATE ingredient_imports SET supplier_name = 'Supplier 1', quantity = 20.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ingredient_imports SET import_date = '2022-10-15', ingredient_name = 'Sugar', supplier_name = 'Supplier 2' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE ingredient_imports SET quantity = 50.25, supplier_name = 'Supplier A' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE ingredient_imports SET supplier_name = 'Supplier B', import_date = '2023-10-15', quantity = 75.00 WHERE ingredient_name = 'Salt'
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = 1000, unit_price = 5.99 WHERE ingredient_id = 3;
UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_name = 'Updated Supplier 1', email = 'updated1@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = 100, unit_price = 15.99 WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND ingredient_name = 'Salt';
UPDATE Ingredients SET quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Suppliers SET country = 'USA', phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE specialty_ingredients SET quantity = 20 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET location = 'New York' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE specialty_ingredients SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE name = 'Sugar';
UPDATE orders SET order_date = '2023-05-10', quantity = 15 WHERE order_id = 101;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_email='newemail@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ingredients SET price=12.99 WHERE id=5;
UPDATE ingredient_categories SET category_name = 'Spices' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_email = 'newemail@example.com', country = 'Spain' WHERE id = 3;
